reviewText: We know that tiny dots of yellow against blue, or yellow opposing violet change a mood or the feel of a painting. However, Seurat made a career of  studing and experimenting with such challenges. Beneath the initial elegant  calm of his work lurks a tale of passions, hopes, fears and secrets.  This  film shares with us the whole world of Georges Seurat, isolated yet  comfortable around people; troubled, yet clear of mind and vision.  As a  painter this film filled me with hope and inspiration. I learned something,  and that my friends is worth the price of admission.
